raw_comment:
I wonder why there is a grey bar between the two dots.
The bar implies that there is something meaningful between the two dots and I think there is not.
And that frustrates me that smart people would make such a weird mistake.
ace_sentences: I wonder why there is a grey bar between the two dots.
The bar implies that there is something meaningful between the two dots.
I think that there is nothing meaningful between the two dots.
I think that smart people made a weird mistake.
